page.title: 19LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: {Children}Scouts,Cubs and Brownies meet weekly in the Old School building in Moss Lane.Fishing in Bridgewater Canal including annual boys' competition. Horse riding especially popular with girls,many owning own horses.There is a Riding School in Moore.Swimming very popular-pools in Runcorn and Warrington. {Adults}Aerobics and Popmobility enjoyed by ladies.'Young Wives'and W.I.meet monthly.Darts matches and quizzes in Red Lion pub.Gun Club has headquarters in Walton Gardens. Moore Rugby Club-Moss Lane runs teams in local league - also boys team. Proposed crown green bowling green - to be seeded in 1985 at a cost of Â£2500 raised in Â£25 units - these subscriptions to be returned, interest free, after 5 years.Bar at Rugby Club well utilised during week.W/E discos.
